title: Tick Configuration
description: The tick.json file specifies which mcfunction files should run every game tick (20 times per second). Located at functions/tick.json in behavior packs. Functions listed here run at origin (0, 0, 0) in the overworld as soon as the world is initialized.

tokens.text: specifies functions to run every tick

fields.title: Values
fields.description: An array of function paths to execute every tick. Function paths are relative to the functions folder without the .mcfunction extension (e.g., 'namespace/function_name').

fields.title: Function Path
fields.description: Path to a .mcfunction file relative to the functions folder, without file extension.

note: Functions in this file run server-side on every game tick. They execute at origin (0, 0, 0) in the overworld and run as soon as the world is initialized, regardless of whether a player has loaded.
